title: LG C2 OLED TV - Pixel Cleaning
summary: Preventing burn-in and using Pixel Cleaning.
content:
Pixel Cleaning: 
1. Go to Settings > General > OLED Care > OLED Panel Care. 
2. Select 'Pixel Cleaning'. 
3. Choose 'Start Now' (TV turns off for 10 mins) or 'Start Once TV is Off'. 
Warning: Do not unplug the TV from the wall during this process.
